title: Zoom | Software Engineer
content:
Years of Experience: 1.3
Prior Experience: Product Company
Current Compenstaion: 17LPA annually
Date of the Offer: Dec'22
Company: Zoom Video Communications India
Title/Level: Software Engineer(ZP1)
Location: Bengaluru/Remote
Salary: 24,50,000 INR
Stock bonus: $60K stock grant vested over 4 years
Annual Bonus: upto INR 2,00,000
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~39 LPA INR (yearly)
Benefits: Standard Zoom benefits.
Other details: NA

title: Offer evaluation | Twilio SSE(L3)
content:
Education: B.Tech CSE Tier 1
Years of Experience: ~3.5years (Product based ecommerce startup)
Current TC: 34L(base) + 26L esops/yr= ~60L
Date of the Offer: Aug 2024
Company: Twilio
Title/Level: Software Engineer L3
Location: Remote
Salary: INR 40L +2.6L (PF+gratuity)
Relocation: None
Signing Bonus: 4L
Stock bonus(RSUs): $45K stock grant vested over 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 56 LPA 

There is annual 12.5%bonus as well, making TC comparable to my current TC. They said its the best they can do considering my experience. Looking for feedback from folks whether this is a good offer or not. Would appreciate reviews on Twilio around quality of work/WLB etc.

title: Directi | New Grad | SDE - I
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science (IIT/NIT/IIIT)
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Internship at FAANG
Date of the Offer: August 2024
Company: Directi
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer
Location: Bengalore
Base Salary:  ₹21,00,000
Relocation:  ₹75,000
Joining Bonus:  ₹3,50,000
Stock bonus: $14K stock grant vested over 4 years - 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%
Bonus:  ₹8,50,000 (1,00,000+1,50,000+2,25,000+3,75,000) paid across 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): around  ₹28,00,000

title: Deshaw SMTS Gurugaon
content:
Education: BE computer science
Years of Experience: 3 Years
Prior Experience: SDE-2 at Microsoft, SDE-2 Amazon
Previous Compensation CTC: 65.3 LPA
Date of the Offer: Aug 2024
Company: DE Shaw
Title/Level: Senior Member of Technical Staff (SMTS)
Location: Gurgaon, India
Base Salary: ₹53 LPA
Signing Bonus: ₹2 LPA
Performance Bonus: ₹ 22Lakh -26 lakh
Relocation Bonus: ₹50k as reimbursements
Total comp (Salary + Bonus): ₹ 77 lakh to 81 lakh PA
Second Year Comp -> 88.5 - 92 LPA
Third Year Comp -> 1.06 cr
How is the offer?
